    ğŸ“œ main

    #include "Game2D.h"
#include "Examples/PrimitivesGallery.h"
#include "RandomNumberGenerator.h"

namespace jm
{
	class Example : public Game2D
	{
	public:
		Example()
			: Game2D()
		{}

		void update() override
		{
			/* ë…¸ë€ ì‚¼ê°í˜• ê·¸ë¦¬ëŠ” ë¶€ë¶„ */
			beginTransformation();
			{
				translate(vec2{ -0.5f, -0.05f });
				drawFilledTriangle(Colors::yellow, 0.3f);
			}
			endTransformation();

			 /* ë¹¨ê°„ ì› ê·¸ë¦¬ëŠ” ë¶€ë¶„ */
			beginTransformation();
			{
				drawFilledCircle(Colors::red, 0.15f);
			}
			endTransformation();

		}
	};
}

int main(void)
{
	jm::Example().run();
	//jm::Game2D().init("This is my digital canvas!", 1280, 960, false).run();
	//jm::PrimitivesGallery().run();

	return 0;
}

    ğŸ“œ main

    ì´ë ‡ê²Œ ì‚¼ê°í˜• ê¸°ëŠ¥ê³¼ ë™ê·¸ë¼ë¯¸ ê¸°ëŠ¥ì„ ê°ê° í´ë˜ìŠ¤ë¡œ ë”°ë¡œ ë¬¶ê³  ê°ì²´ë¥¼ ìƒì„±í•˜ì—¬ ê¸°ëŠ¥ì„ ì‚¬ìš©í•˜ë‹ˆ ì•„ë˜ì™€ ê°™ì´ í›¨ì”¬ ê¹”ë”í•´ì§„ ê²ƒì„ ë³¼ ìˆ˜ ìˆë‹¤.

	{
	public:

		Triangle my_tri;
		Circle my_cir;

			my_cir.draw();

	return 0;

    ì¢€ ë” ì¼ë°˜í™” í•´ë³´ê¸°

    • void draw()ì˜ translate(vec2{-0.5f, -0.05f});
      • ë”± ê³ ì •ëœ (- 0.5f, - 0.05f) ì¢Œí‘œë¡œë§Œ ì´ë™í•  ìˆ˜ ìˆë‹¤ëŠ” í•œê³„ê°€ ìˆë‹¤.
    • Triangleë„ Circleë„ ë‘˜ ë‹¤ ìƒ‰ê¹”ê³¼ ìœ„ì¹˜ ê°’ì„ ê°ì²´ë§ˆë‹¤ ë‹¤ì–‘í•˜ê²Œ ì„¤ì •í•˜ê³  ì‹¶ì„í…Œë‹ˆ ì¢€ ë” ì¼ë°˜í™” í•˜ì—¬ ë‹¤ì–‘í•œ ì‚¼ê°í˜•ê³¼ ì›ì„ ê·¸ë¦´ ìˆ˜ ìˆë„ë¡ ë‹¤ì–‘í•œ ê°’ìœ¼ë¡œ ì„¤ì •ë  ìˆ˜ ìˆë„ë¡ ë©¤ë²„ ë³€ìˆ˜ ë¡œ ë§Œë“¤ì—ˆë‹¤.

    ğŸ“œTriangle.h

    #pragma once
#include "Game2D.h"

namespace jm
{
	class Triangle
	{
	public:
		vec2 pos = vec2{ -0.5f, -0.05f };
		RGB color = Colors::yellow;
		float size = 0.3f;

		void draw()
		{
			beginTransformation();
			{
				translate(pos);
				drawFilledTriangle(color, size);
			}
			endTransformation();
		}
	};
}

    ğŸ“œCircle.h

    #pragma once
#include "Game2D.h"

namespace jm
{
	class Circle
	{
	public:
		vec2 pos = vec2{ 0.0f, 0.0f };
		RGB color = Colors::red;
		float size = 0.15;

		void draw()
		{
			beginTransformation();
			{
				translate(pos);
				drawFilledCircle(color, size);
			}
			endTransformation();
		}
	};
}

    ğŸ“œ main

    ì•„ë˜ì™€ ê°™ì´ ë©¤ë²„ë³€ìˆ˜ì— ì ‘ê·¼í•˜ì—¬ ì›í•˜ëŠ” ë‹¤ì–‘í•œ ê°’ìœ¼ë¡œ ì„¤ì •í•  ìˆ˜ ìˆê²Œ ë˜ì—ˆë‹¤. ìƒì„±ìì—ì„œ ê°ì²´ì˜ ë©¤ë²„ ë³€ìˆ˜ë¥¼ ì„¤ì •í•´ ì£¼ì—ˆìŒ.

    #include "Game2D.h"
#include "Examples/PrimitivesGallery.h"
#include "RandomNumberGenerator.h"
#include "Triangle.h" â­
#include "Circle.h" â­

namespace jm
{
	class Example : public Game2D
	{
	public:

		Triangle my_tri;
		Circle my_cir;

		Example()
			: Game2D() // ìƒì„±ì
		{
			my_tri.color = Colors::gold;
			my_tri.pos = vec2{ -0.5f, 0.2f };
			my_tri.size = 0.25f;

			my_cir.color = Colors::olive;
			my_cir.pos = vec2{ 0.1f, 0.1f };
			my_cir.size = 0.2f;
		}

		void update() override
		{
			my_tri.draw();
			my_cir.draw();
		}
	};
}

int main(void)
{
	jm::Example().run();

	return 0;
}

    ë¶€ëª¨ í´ë˜ìŠ¤ì— ì´ˆê¸°í™” í•˜ëŠ” í•¨ìˆ˜ë¥¼ ë”°ë¡œ ë§Œë“¤ë©´ ë” ê¹”ë”í•˜ê²Œ ì´ˆê¸°í™” í•  ìˆ˜ ìˆë‹¤.

    ğŸ“œGeometricObject.h

    #pragma once

#include "Game2D.h"

namespace jm
{
	class GeometricObject
	{
	public:
		vec2 pos;
		RGB color;
		float size;

		void init(const RGB& _color, const vec2& _pos, const float& _size)
		{
			color = _color;
			pos = _pos;
			size = _size;
		}
	};
}
    • void init(const RGB& _color, const vec2& _pos, const float& _size)
      • ë©¤ë²„ ë³€ìˆ˜ë“¤ì„ ì´ˆê¸°í™” í•˜ëŠ” í•¨ìˆ˜

    ğŸ“œ main

    #include "Game2D.h"
#include "Examples/PrimitivesGallery.h"
#include "RandomNumberGenerator.h"
#include "Triangle.h"
#include "Circle.h"

namespace jm
{
	class Example : public Game2D
	{
	public:

		Triangle my_tri;
		Circle my_cir;

		Example()
			: Game2D()
		{ // ë” ê¹”ë”í•˜ê²Œ ì´ˆê¸°í™” í•  ìˆ˜ ìˆê²Œ ë˜ì—ˆë‹¤. 
			my_tri.init(Colors::gold, vec2{ -0.5f, 0.2f }, 0.25f);
			my_cir.init(Colors::olive, vec2{ 0.1f, 0.1f }, 0.2f);
		}

		void update() override
		{
			my_tri.draw();
			my_cir.draw();
		}
	};
}

int main(void)
{
	jm::Example().run();

	return 0;
}

    Circleì˜ draw()ì™€ Triangleì˜ draw()ì˜ ê³µí†µëœ ë¶€ë¶„ê³¼ ê³ ìœ í•œ ë¶€ë¶„

	{
		translate(pos);
		drawGeometry(); // ê°ìì˜ ê³ ìœ í•œ ë¶€ë¶„
	}
	endTransformation();

void drawGeometry()  
{
	// drawFilledCircle(color, size); ğŸ‘‰ğŸ» Circle í´ë˜ìŠ¤ì˜ ê²½ìš°
    // drawFilledTriangle(color, size); ğŸ‘‰ğŸ» Triangle í´ë˜ìŠ¤ì˜ ê²½ìš°

    ğŸ“œGeometricObject.h

    • draw()
    • drawGeometry()
      • ê°€ìƒí•¨ìˆ˜ì´ë¯€ë¡œ ì˜¤ë²„ë¼ì´ë”© í•œ ìì‹ì´ ìˆë‹¤ë©´ ìì‹ë§Œì˜ drawGeometry()ë¥¼ í˜¸ì¶œ
      • ì¼ë¶€ëŸ¬ ì˜¤ë²„ë¼ì´ë”© í•˜ë¼ê³  ë¹ˆ ë‚´ìš©
    #pragma once

#include "Game2D.h"

namespace jm
{
	class GeometricObject
	{
	public:
		vec2 pos;
		RGB color;
		float size;

		void init(const RGB& _color, const vec2& _pos, const float& _size)
		{
			color = _color;
			pos = _pos;
			size = _size;
		}

		virtual void drawGeometry() // ê°€ìƒ í•¨ìˆ˜
		{
			// ë¹ˆ ë‚´ìš©
		}

		void draw()
		{
			beginTransformation();
			{
				translate(pos);
				drawGeometry();
			}
			endTransformation();
		}
	};
}

    ğŸ“œCircle.h

    #pragma once

namespace jm
{
	class Circle : public GeometricObject
	{
	public:

		void drawGeometry()  // ì˜¤ë²„ë¼ì´ë”©
		{
			drawFilledCircle(color, size);
		}
	};
}

    ğŸ“œGeometricObject.h

    • ëª¨ë“  ìì‹ë“¤ì´ ê³µí†µìœ¼ë¡œ ê°€ì§€ê³  ìˆëŠ” pos, color ë¥¼ ì´ˆê¸°í™” ì‹œì¼œì¤€ë‹¤.
      • void init(const RGB& _color, const vec2& _pos)
    #pragma once

#include "Game2D.h"

namespace jm
{
	class GeometricObject
	{
	public:
		vec2 pos; 
		RGB color; 

		void init(const RGB& _color, const vec2& _pos)
		{
			color = _color;
			pos = _pos;
		}

		virtual void drawGeometry() const
		{
			//
		}

		void draw()
		{
			beginTransformation();
			{
				translate(pos);
				drawGeometry();
			}
			endTransformation();
		}
	};
}

    ğŸ“œCircle.h, ğŸ“œTriangle.h

    #pragma once
#include "GeometricObject.h"

namespace jm
{
	class Circle : public GeometricObject
	{
	public:
		float size; â­

		void init(const RGB& _color, const vec2& _pos, const float& _size)
		{
			GeometricObject::init(_color, _pos); // color, posëŠ” ë¶€ëª¨ ì´ˆê¸°í™” í•¨ìˆ˜ë¡œ

			size = _size; 
		}

		void drawGeometry() const override
		{
			drawFilledCircle(GeometricObject::color, this->size);
		}
	};
}

      • width = _width;, height = _height
    #pragma once

#include "GeometricObject.h"

namespace jm
{
	class Box : public GeometricObject
	{
	public:
		float width, height; â­

		void init(const RGB& _color, const vec2& _pos, 
			const float& _width, const float& _height) 
		{
			GeometricObject::***init***(_color, _pos);
			/*
			GeometricObject::color = _color; // ì‚¬ì‹¤ ì´ˆê¸°í™” í•¨ìˆ˜ ì•ˆ ì“°ê³  ì´ë ‡ê²Œ í•´ì¤˜ë„ ëœë‹¤.
			GeometricObject::pos = _pos;
			*/
			width = _width;
			height = _height;
		}

		void drawGeometry() const override
		{
			drawFilledBox(Colors::blue,
				this->width, this->height);
		}
	};
}
